channel.title: Comments for Plataformatec Blog
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: Comment on Building a new MySQL adapter for Ecto, Part III: DBConnection Integration by luo.la
item.dc:creator: luo.la
item.description: Ye ! This Is A Good Blog!

item.title: Comment on Elixir, processes and this thing called OTP by Ricado
item.dc:creator: Ricado

item.title: Comment on Elixir, processes and this thing called OTP by bvjebin
item.dc:creator: bvjebin
item.description: Good introduction for processes in elixir. Worth a mention - erlang allows to connect nodes with simple steps and therefore we can communicate between processes from different nodes. Also process migrations are possible between nodes.
item.content:encoded: Good introduction for processes in elixir. Worth a mention – erlang allows to connect nodes with simple steps and therefore we can communicate between processes from different nodes. Also process migrations are possible between nodes.

item.title: Comment on Elixir, processos e esse tal de OTP by Pedro Gomes
item.dc:creator: Pedro Gomes

item.title: Comment on Elixir, processos e esse tal de OTP by Adolfo Neto (UTFPR)
item.dc:creator: Adolfo Neto (UTFPR)

item.title: Comment on Os desafios de desenvolver uma cultura ágil by George Moura
item.dc:creator: George Moura
item.description:
O maior problema que enfrento é fazer os superiores e a equipe entender os beneficios e entender o que e ser agil.
Como vender o conceito ágil? Como fazer a equipe entender e aprender o que é ser ágil?
item.content:encoded:
O maior problema que enfrento é fazer os superiores e a equipe entender os beneficios e entender o que e ser agil.

Como vender o conceito ágil?
Como fazer a equipe entender e aprender o que é ser ágil?
